Reviews.Title: Great Bundle!
Reviews.Author: Dennis H. Wilkins "DHW in LV"
Reviews.Content: Great price!  The bundle contained just the combination of goodies I was looking for.  For some reason UPS had no ability to track the package but it arrived as advertised and on time.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle combination
Reviews.Author: Raul Diaz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kit because I'm just starting in this world and, among all bundles with something more than a 18-55 lens, I did not want to carry 2 lenses wherever I go, so this 18-135 fits perfectly my needs.The price is great and it's justified because only camera body and lens are genuinely Canon. Nor the main battery neither the 2 replacements are Canon, as well as the battery charger. However I think it's worth the price if you compare how much it costs to buy this same camera with the 18-135 by itself, no bundles.Highly recommended if you want to start in the DSLR world and don't want to worry about buying extra accessories, this kit has everything you need for ages!

ProductInfo.Features:
SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot, 18MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
3.0" Clear View Vari-Angle LCD
100-6400 ISO, Full HD Movie Mode w/ Manual Exposure
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses, 3.7 Frames/Second Continuous Shooting
63 Zone Dual-Layer Metering / 9-Point AF, Intelligent Auto Mode
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 600d Digital SLR Camera with Ef-s 18-135mm F/3.5-5.6 Is Lens, 2x Extra Lenses, 2x Extended Battery, 16gb Sdhc Memory, Hdmi Cabel, 57 Inch Aluminum Tripod and More
